definition: in some social insects (such as ants) a physically distinct individual or group of individuals specialized to perform certain functions in the colony
details:
noun
- in some social insects (such as ants) a physically distinct individual or group of individuals specialized to perform certain functions in the colony
- a social class separated from others by distinctions of hereditary rank or profession or wealth
- (Hinduism) a hereditary social class among Hindus
- social status or position conferred by a system based on class
= example: social status or position conferred by a system based on class
